field.comment: The name of this task, it should be readable but preferably immutable. E.g. the action code. This may be used for security checks as well
field.name: task

structure.comment: The input data of this task (if any)
structure.name: taskInput

field.comment: The queue to use, if no queue is provided, a generic "humanTask" queue will be used
field.name: queue

field.comment: Optionally the security context where we check the target against
field.name: contextId
